food_interactions: Avoid alcohol. Alcohol increases the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding.; Avoid herbs and supplements with anticoagulant/antiplatelet activity. Examples include garlic, ginger, bilberry, danshen, piracetam, and ginkgo biloba.; Take after a meal. This reduces irritating gastrointestinal effects.; Take with a full glass of water.
